page.title: 14BREAN ARTIST-MARICE BISHOP
page.content: MAURICE BISHOP IS A LOCAL MAN WHO HAS RECENTLY SET UP HIS STUDIO IN A BUILDING OVERLOOKING BREAN DOWN,UPHILL AND THE BRISTOL CHANNEL. SINCE LEAVING SCHOOL,HE HAD A NUMBER OF JOBS BUT HE HAS ALWAYS MAINTAINED HIS INTEREST IN PAINTING.HE WORKED FROM A STUDIO IN BURNHAM-ON-SEA FOR MANY YEARS BUT HE HAS NOW MOVED TO BREAN.IN HIS EARLY DAYS,AS AN ARTIST,HE BECAME WELL KNOWN FOR HIS BLACK AND WHITE DRAWINGS WHICH HE PRINTED BY THE SILK SCREEN METHOD. TODAY HE SPECIALISES IN PAINTING IN OIL,MAINLY LANDSCAPES.HIS MAIN SUBJECTS ARE THE SAND DUNES,BREAN DOWN AND SEA SCAPES.LOOKING WEST OVER THE SEA,HE IS ABLE TO USE THE WONDERFUL SUNSETS SEEN ALONG THIS COAST AS INSPIRATION FOR HIS WORK.
